name: UC - List Extension
description: Free Plug-in under MIT License, which means it is free for everyone to use, no matter if for commercial or private use. UC List Extension is an Oracle APEX plug-in designed to improve user experience when adding new values to an existing List of Values (LOV). Users can quickly and easily add a new value to an existing Select List, Popup LOV, Radio Group, Checkbox, or Shuttle and automatically select the newly created value - all without leaving the page they are working on or losing their place in the application!  Now supports Interactive Grids!
